meta.info:
This is a test to validate that ACCEPT and CONTENT-TYPE headers are correctly validated for both legacy (Old) and not
-supported (NotSupported)
This request allows us to add a new participant to Account Lookup Service.

This request allows us to add a new participant to Account Lookup Service.

Validate Not Support Accept header.

assertions.description: Response errorDescription to contain`Unacceptable version requested`
exec: expect(response.body.errorInformation.errorDescription).to.contain('Unacceptable version requested - The Client requested an unsupported version')

assertions.description: Response header content-type to be correct

meta.info: This request allows us to add a new participant to Account Lookup Service. Validate Not Support Content-Type header.

assertions.description: Response errorDescription to contain`Unacceptable version requested`
exec: expect(response.body.errorInformation.errorDescription).to.contain('Unacceptable version requested - Client supplied a protocol version which is not supported by the server')

assertions.description: Response header content-type to be correct

meta.info:
This is a test to validate that ACCEPT and CONTENT-TYPE headers are correctly validated for both legacy (Old) and not
-supported (NotSupported)
This request allows us to get the personal information associated with a MSISDN and the FSP associated to it.

assertions.description: Request FSPIOP-Source same as inputs fromFspId
Callback FSPIOP-Destination same as request FSPIOP-Source

meta.info: This request allows us to send a request for Quote (payerfsp to payeefsp), for the calculation of possible fees and FSP commission involved in performing an interoperable financial transaction.

assertions.description: Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback transferAmount (amount & currency)to match the request
Request transactionType scenario to be TRANSFER
Request transactionType initiator to be PAYER
Request transactionType initiatorType to be CONSUMER

meta.info: This request allows us to send a request for Quote (payerfsp to payeefsp), for the calculation of possible fees and FSP commission involved in performing an interoperable financial transaction. Validate Not Support Accept header.

assertions.description: Response errorDescription to contain`Unacceptable version requested`
exec: expect(response.body.errorInformation.errorDescription).to.contain('Unacceptable version requested - The Client requested an unsupported version')

assertions.description: Response header content-type to be correct

meta.info: This request allows us to send a request for Quote (payerfsp to payeefsp), for the calculation of possible fees and FSP commission involved in performing an interoperable financial transaction.

assertions.description: Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback transferAmount (amount & currency)to match the request
Request transactionType scenario to be TRANSFER
Request transactionType initiator to be PAYER
Request transactionType initiatorType to be CONSUMER

meta.info: This request allows us to send a Transfer (payerfsp to payeefsp), resulting in an ILP transfer exchanged between two account holders on either side of a common ledger.

assertions.description: Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Request transferId same as quote request transferId
Request transferAmount (amount & currency) to match quote request
Request FSP source the same as quote callback FSP destination
